title: godoc should ignore .git etc
body:
Godoc currently lists ".git" and co under "Subdirectories" in the
help output. They should be suppressed.


For example:

$ goinstall alaska.wh3rd.net/gotest.git
$ godoc alaska.wh3rd.net/gotest.git
PACKAGE

package gotest
import "alaska.wh3rd.net/gotest.git"

FUNCTIONS

func Foo()


SUBDIRECTORIES

	.git
